level.heading: Payment of sanitary sewer service charges.
History
level.text: (Oct. 21, 1975, D.C. Law 1-23, title VII, § 701(c), 22 DCR 2115; repealed pursuant to § 304 of D.C. Law 11-111.)

level.heading: Emergency Legislation
level.text: For temporary amendment of section, see § 4(d) of the Confirmation Emergency Amendment Act of 1999 (D.C. Act 13-25, March 15, 1999, 46 DCR 2971).

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 11-111
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 11-111, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 34-2104.

level.heading: Editor's Notes
level.text: Repeal effective 90 days after meeting of Board: Section 304 of D.C. Law 11-111 repealed this section. However, § 601 of D.C. Law 11-111 provided that title III of the act shall apply 90 days after the initial meeting of the Board established by section 204 of the act.
